jb_artifacts.response:
You're referring to the infamous op-ed piece that sparked a controversy!

The article you're talking about is "Former President's Disarming Beginnings" (OpEd), which ran on June 7, 2020. It was an opinion editorial piece written by The New York Times' editor-in-chief, Fred Manassi.

The piece sparked controversy because it questioned the truthfulness of former US Presidents George Washington and Thomas Jefferson's past drug use habits as teenagers. Specifically, the article brought up their alleged use of opium and marijuana in the late 18th century.
